jobPosting.title: Senior C++ Software Engineer - Financial Big Data

description.rawText: Senior C++ Software Engineer – STL,  Real-Time,  Multi-Threaded,  Low Latency,  Windows,  Big Data,  NoSQL,  Cassandra,  Distributed Computing,  Machine Learning,  Artificial Intelligence,  NoSQLFinancial Software Vendor.  South East London.  £60, 000 - £70, 000 + Benefits + BonusA Financial Software Vendor based in Surrey is looking to hire a Senior C++ Software Engineer to work on the development of a Financial Big Data system that works inAs the Senior C++ Software Engineer (Big Data,  Distributed Computing,  TDD,  NoSQL) you will be working on a Windows platform building a low latency trading system that sends Financial prices in real-time to market participants.  In order to cope with the large amount of real-time data they use a number of databases utilised for Big Data including Cassandra and KDB so any experience with Big data would be extremely beneficial for them.  In addition they are constantly looking to create smarter algorithms that detect problems with the data as quickly as possible so any experience with Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning would give you a real advantage. This Financial Software Vendor are around 40 people,  all based in South East London,  and have cultivated a fantastic place to work.  Not only do they promote excellent technology but they also have strong staff retention by working on the culture of the firm,  making it an excellent place to work. The Senior C++ Software Engineer (Big Data,  Distributed Computing,  TDD,  NoSQL) will need:    Strong experience with C++ development – Essential  Strong experience with Mathematics – Essential  Experience with Big Data – Very Beneficial  Experience with Machine Learning or Artificial Intelligence – Very Beneficial  Experience with Distributed Computing - Beneficial   Please get in touch with Tom Kemp at Harrington Starr for more information. Senior C++ Software Engineer – STL,  Real-Time,  Multi-Threaded,  Low Latency,  Windows,  Big Data,  NoSQL,  Cassandra,  Distributed Computing,  Machine Learning,  Artificial Intelligence,  NoSQL

companyDescription.rawText: Harrington Starr deliver high quality IT professionals on a permanent,  retained,  contract,  and interim basis to the global financial services and commodity trading sectors.  Specialising in Financial IT,  Commodities IT,  Buy and Sell Side Trading Systems and Enterprise Technology we provide a full solution to all of our clientsand candidates. Our experienced consultants are passionate about our core belief of excellence through understanding and we strive to work with both our clients and candidates to ensure we consistently deliver to their needs.  We believe that  success in the search for talent comes from developing a deep understanding of your situation and having a malleable approach to presenting the best solutions to exceed expectations.   We are meticulous in our attention to detail,  seeking to ensure we  consistently fulfil a thorough and comprehensive service that leads to complete customer satisfaction.  Through this detail,  we will tailor solutions that hold strong,  long term benefits as well as short term wins.  We pride ourselves on getting thebasics right ensuring that we achieve excellence by mastering the fundamentals. We see honesty as integral to our relationships  and  will advise on what the best solutions for the customer are.  We don’t look to force decisions,  we look to present  and advise on options.  We understand our markets and  have built impressive networks throughout the industry  for candidates and clients alike. We are  highly committed to the details.  We deal in facts,  not opinions.   We seek to master the basics.  We are focused in our markets.   We understand the needs of our customers.  We consistently deliver. All  of these combine to ensure Harrington Starr consistently makes it happen for our clients and candidates.

specialities: Financial Services and Commodities IT Recruitment
